sentence: (WHTM) – A new Fox News poll shows former hedge fund CEO Dave McCormick taking a nine point lead in the race to represent Pennsylvania in the United States Senate.
author: George Stockburger
title: McCormick, Oz lead Fox News Poll of Pa. Senate race

sentence: In a race for a seat that could help determine the balance of power in the Senate, Oz and former hedge fund CEO Dave McCormick are at the top of the GOP primary polls.
author: Austin Kellerman
title: What to watch for in Dr. Oz’s first televised Senate debate

sentence: In a race expected to help determine the balance of power in the Senate, former hedge fund CEO Dave McCormick and celebrity physician Mehmet Oz are at the top of the polls.
author: Austin Kellerman
title: 4 things to watch for in the Pennsylvania GOP Senate Debate
